title: Session trial metadata template template schema
description: Session trial metadata template template schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

propertyDescriptions.Session Metadata: Metadata for the sessions in the dataset.

items.title: Session Metadata field schema
items.description: Session Metadata field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

propertyDescriptions.sessionID: A session is defined as the continuous time block between when the first data point is recorded after the subject is brought in and when the subject leaves. The sessionID is a unique identifier which should match the “ses-<label>” used in file naming system.
propertyDescriptions.sessionStartDateTime: Date and time of start of session. This should correspond to the first date time when the first data point of the session was recorded.
propertyDescriptions.sessionDuration: The total duration of the session.
propertyDescriptions.sessionQuality: A general rating of the quality of the session to simplify data screenings for further analyses.
propertyDescriptions.sessionDataQuality: A general rating of the quality of the primary data signals.
propertyDescriptions.trialCount: Total number of trials within a session.
